items.sentence: It\'s a nice place, but I wouldn\'t live there.
Tom didn\'t make any mistakes on today\'s test.
Tom didn\'t need Mary\'s permission to do that.
Tom didn\'t need to stay if he didn\'t want to.
Maybe Tom didn\'t do what everyone says he did.
The restaurant we went to wasn\'t so expensive.
There\'s something I need to talk to you about.
You\'re not the only one who doesn\'t like Tom.
I can\'t concentrate on that problem right now.
I certainly don\'t go out as much as I used to.
I did that without asking for anyone\'s advice.
Some of Tom\'s students speak French very well.
My guess is that Tom isn\'t going to want that.
I heard a strange sound coming from the garage.
She insisted that he should go to the hospital.
Tom took a moment to consider the consequences.
I don\'t think Tom knows Mary can speak French.
I don\'t think Tom knows anybody at our school.
I don\'t think Tom was involved in the scandal.
I don\'t think Tom will ever speak to me again.
